main.name: Morenikeji Ajisegiri
main.description: I am a skilled, innovative, and motivated Frontend Developer with years of proven expertise in applying modern technologies such as HTML/CSS, React, Redux, Webflow and S.E.O, as well as utilizing best practices to improve organizational effectiveness and maximize productivity.
main.bio: Creative and detail-oriented Frontend Developer with years of experience designing and developing scalable, responsive web applications. Proficient in modern technologies including React, Next, Redux, and Tailwind CSS. Skilled in optimizing performance, enhancing user experience, and collaborating in Agile teams to deliver impactful solutions for fintech and other industries.
